countryCodes.title: Country Codes
countryCodes.description: Comma separated list of country codes for which a phone number is accepted (ex: fr, us, ...). This is used to control the phone number validity

graviteeResource.title: Resource
graviteeResource.description: Resource to send SMS and to verify user code

messageBody.title: Message body
messageBody.description: The text of the message you want to send (Your authentication code is : {#context.attributes['code']}). Optional if the resource offers 2FA service

returnDigits.title: Number of digits
returnDigits.description: Number of digits the user needs to enter. Optional if the resource offers 2FA service

expiresAfter.title: Expires after
expiresAfter.description: The code will be expired after the specified time (in seconds). Default: 300 seconds (5 minutes). Optional if the resource offers 2FA service
